name: Click, Click, Doom!!
description: I was going for a post-apocalyptic monster tapper, but it turned into a cyberpunk setting with fantasy monsters. This is my first attempt at creating a game. I may make changes further down the line. Once sound is turned off with mute button, it cannot be turned back on with the mute button, but it does sometimes start again when returning from credits or fight scene. sandwich button loads credits page, lightning bolt on fight screen adds damage per second in exchange for souls at incremental amounts(multiples of 5), souls gained and monster health increase in relation to upgrade level.
